title: Surgical Solutions CEO on Covid-19 Vaccine
itunes:title: Surgical Solutions CEO on Covid-19 Vaccine
description:
Alyssa Rapp, CEO of Surgical Solutions, discusses front line health care workers getting the Covid-19 vaccine. Bloomberg News Congressional Tax Reporter Laura Davison talks about what people need to know about a second stimulus payment. Professor Brenda Shaffer, Research Faculty Member at U.S. Naval Post-Graduate School, shares her insight on how the government relief package could impact the oil industry. And we Drive to the Close with Christian Munafo, CIO at Liberty Street Advisors.

Hosts: Paul Sweeney and Alix Steel. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
